DYAD: ANGOLA-SOUTH AFRICA

PS-UPDATE2020: Commitment to improve relations: https://www.africanews.com/2018/03/03/south-africa-keen-to-boost-cooperation-with-angola/

PSNOTES: thompson rivalry cm540560 ,19750000 ,19880000

Territorial-Maritime-Boundary Issues Variables

MID1441 

TERRMID: MID1441 3 -- not territory 
TERRMID-CER: MID1441 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: 

TERRLINK: MID1441 3 -- not third party link to territory 
TERRLINK-CER: MID1441 1 -- certain 
TERRLINK-NOTES: 

MARITMID: MID1441 3 -- not maritime 
MARITMID-CER: MID1441 1 -- certain 
MARITMID-NOTES: 

ISLMID: MID1441 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID1441 1 -- certain 
ISLMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARMID: MID1441 1 -- civil war MID
CIVWARMID-CER: MID1441 1 -- certain 
CIVWARMID-NOTES: MID1441 from Gibler 2018, Angola was experiencing a civil war from 1975-1988, and several countries intervened in various ways. South Africa was heavily involved in the civil war, assisting rebels militarily against the government. Coded civil war MID because this was connected to the Angolan civil war, and Angola lies within this dyad. 

CIVWARLINK: MID1441 3 -- not civil war link 
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID1441 1 -- certain 
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: 

COUPMID: MID1441 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID1441 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID1441 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID1441 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES: 

RIVNOTES: South Africa supported UNITA, the opposition, to the Algerian government during the Angolan Civil War.

SOURCES: Gibler, D.M. 2018. Militarized Interstate Dispute Narratives, 1816-2010. Langham, MD: Rowman and Littlefield.
